## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is bold and capitalized, with an umlaut over the letter "A." The logo is set against a yellow background with a black horizontal line beneath the text. The design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 5 SMART CONTROL FLEX eco!Booster Für mehr Performance: der K 5 Smart Control Flex eco!Booster mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole und eco!Booster Kit für starke Verschmutzungen auf sensiblen Oberflächen. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.324-739.0 ## Text Content - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529127464
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 13,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17,6
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q Smart Control
Multi Jet 3-in-1 [x]
eco!Booster [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergkühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]
App-Verbindung per Bluetooth [x]
## Description The image depicts a pressure washer set, primarily in yellow and black colors. The set includes the following components: 1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It features a handle on top for easy portability. - There are wheels at the base for maneuverability. - A hose is coiled around the unit, indicating it is ready for use. 2. **Accessories**: - Two different nozzles are shown: - One nozzle is elongated and black with a yellow accent, likely for general cleaning. - The other nozzle is wider and flat, possibly for surface cleaning. - A bottle of cleaning solution is included, with a label that appears to show the brand and usage instructions. The design suggests a focus on functionality and ease of use, with the bright yellow color enhancing visibility. The set is likely intended for home or light commercial use, suitable for cleaning surfaces like patios, driveways, or vehicles. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall design uses a color scheme of blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, eye-catching design. It includes a large numeral "1" in a light gray color, which serves as a background element. Overlaid on this numeral is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the following text is prominently displayed in black, uppercase letters: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND** This text suggests a claim about the brand's status in the market, specifically highlighting its position as the top prescribed brand for Golimumab, a medication used in certain medical treatments. The use of bold colors and large fonts emphasizes the importance and credibility of the claim. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The logo suggests that the product or item is manufactured in Europe, indicating compliance with European standards or origin. ## Description The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. The smartphone is depicted with a screen and a single button below it. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest the concept of wireless communication or signal transmission, indicating that the phone is either sending or receiving signals. The overall design is simple and uses minimalistic line art to convey the idea of connectivity or mobile communication. ## Description of Figure The image is a warning sign with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized depiction of a road or pathway that appears to be narrowing or leading to a restricted area. The road is represented by two parallel lines that converge towards the left side of the image. To the left of the road depiction, there is a bold yellow arrow pointing left, indicating a direction or movement towards the left. Below the arrow, the text reads: **"ROAD NARROWS"** This text is in uppercase and is centered beneath the arrow, suggesting a cautionary message about the road conditions ahead. Overall, the sign is designed to alert viewers to a potential narrowing of the road or a limited engineering area, emphasizing the need for caution and awareness.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is bold and capitalized, with an umlaut over the letter "A." The logo is set against a yellow background with a black horizontal line beneath the text. The design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 5 SMART CONTROL FLEX eco!Booster

Für mehr Performance: der K 5 Smart Control Flex eco!Booster mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole und eco!Booster Kit für starke Verschmutzungen auf sensiblen Oberflächen.

## Text Content

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529127464
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 13,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17,6
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q Smart Control
Multi Jet 3-in-1 [x]
eco!Booster [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergkühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]
App-Verbindung per Bluetooth [x]

## Description

The image depicts a pressure washer set, primarily in yellow and black colors. The set includes the following components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It features a handle on top for easy portability.
   - There are wheels at the base for maneuverability.
   - A hose is coiled around the unit, indicating it is ready for use.

2. **Accessories**:
   - Two different nozzles are shown:
     - One nozzle is elongated and black with a yellow accent, likely for general cleaning.
     - The other nozzle is wider and flat, possibly for surface cleaning.
   - A bottle of cleaning solution is included, with a label that appears to show the brand and usage instructions.

The design suggests a focus on functionality and ease of use, with the bright yellow color enhancing visibility. The set is likely intended for home or light commercial use, suitable for cleaning surfaces like patios, driveways, or vehicles.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall design uses a color scheme of blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, eye-catching design. It includes a large numeral "1" in a light gray color, which serves as a background element. Overlaid on this numeral is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the following text is prominently displayed in black, uppercase letters:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND**

This text suggests a claim about the brand's status in the market, specifically highlighting its position as the top prescribed brand for Golimumab, a medication used in certain medical treatments. The use of bold colors and large fonts emphasizes the importance and credibility of the claim.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The logo suggests that the product or item is manufactured in Europe, indicating compliance with European standards or origin.

## Description

The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. The smartphone is depicted with a screen and a single button below it. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest the concept of wireless communication or signal transmission, indicating that the phone is either sending or receiving signals. The overall design is simple and uses minimalistic line art to convey the idea of connectivity or mobile communication.

## Description of Figure

The image is a warning sign with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized depiction of a road or pathway that appears to be narrowing or leading to a restricted area. The road is represented by two parallel lines that converge towards the left side of the image.

To the left of the road depiction, there is a bold yellow arrow pointing left, indicating a direction or movement towards the left.

Below the arrow, the text reads:

**"ROAD NARROWS"**

This text is in uppercase and is centered beneath the arrow, suggesting a cautionary message about the road conditions ahead.

Overall, the sign is designed to alert viewers to a potential narrowing of the road or a limited engineering area, emphasizing the need for caution and awareness.
